glsa.title: Netpbm: Buffer overflow in pnmtopng
glsa.synopsis: The pnmtopng utility, part of the Netpbm tools, contains a vulnerability which can potentially result in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Netpbm is a package of 220 graphics programs and a programming library, including pnmtopng, a tool to convert PNM image files to the PNG format.

description.p: RedHat reported that pnmtopng is vulnerable to a buffer overflow.

impact.p: An attacker could craft a malicious PNM file and entice a user to run pnmtopng on it, potentially resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running pnmtopng.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
